Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Custonaci, Villa Zina Park Hotel is in a rural location and close to Prehistoric Caves Mangiapane and Monte Cofano Nature Reserve. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Port of Trapani.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 89 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an outdoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a hair salon. The beach shuttle (surcharge) makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Villa Zina Park Hotel. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, a computer station, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of Villa Zina Park Hotel. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Custonaci, Villa Zina Park Hotel is in a rural location and close to Prehistoric Caves Mangiapane and Monte Cofano Nature Reserve. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Port of Trapani.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sanctuary of Maria Santissima of Custonaci - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Prehistoric Caves Mangiapane - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Monte Cofano Nature Reserve - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
Baia Rio Forgia Beach - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Macari Beach - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi
Nino Croce Theater - 8.6 km / 5.4 mi
Chapel of Saint Crescentia - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Zingaro Beach - 9.7 km / 6 mi
Tonnara of Scopello - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi
Quartiere Spagnolo - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi

Torretta Pepoli - 10.7 km / 6.6 mi
Venere Castle - 10.7 km / 6.6 mi
Church of San Giuliano - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi
Civic Museum Cordici - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi

The preferred airport for Villa Zina Park Hotel is Trapani (TPS-Vicenzo Florio) - 26.5 km / 16.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Villa Zina Park Hotel is Palermo (PMO-Punta Raisi) - 37.4 km / 23.2 mi.
